entry.title: You’re Breathing Too Loud
entry.summary:
Author: Pratham_sterek143

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,790Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 6

Summary: Stiles and Derek are clearly in love. The narrator knows it. The pack knows it. Literally everyone except them knows it. What follows is twelve thousand words of slow burn tension, supernatural drama, and the narrator slowly losing their mind over every missed opportunity to kiss.This is a love story told with teeth-gritted patience and deep, unrelenting exasperation.

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,126Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 101

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,213Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 68

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: bad idea right?
entry.summary:
Author: milf_lovers_anon_42

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,041Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 38

Summary: It’s Stiles’s Freshman year of college and his life in Beacon Hills is finally quiet, no rogue packs, no crazy werewolf hunters, and no one trying to kill him. He couldn’t be more miserable.But this is Stiles Stilinski we are talking about, the quiet never lasts. A kidnapping followed by a series of unexplained disturbances around Beacon Hills pushes him back into the life of supernatural mysteries. It just so happens that he may need the help of a certain annoying, grouchy, hot, werewolf to get to the bottom of what’s causing the sudden chaos.

entry.title: The Hunted Heart Never Rests
entry.summary:
Author: SummertimeRadness

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,443Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Stiles comes from a hunter family, and for the last decade, he's spent his summers training to become the perfect killer. All that's left is to get high school over with and be officially initiated into the clan. Of course, he doesn't count on almost dying in the woods, or on being rescued by one of the werewolves his family is sworn to kill.Derek has been on the run with his sisters since hunters burned down his home and everyone in it. When a string of murders draws them back to Beacon Hills, Derek goes looking for a killer in the woods, only to find a helpless, unconscious human instead...

entry.title: Ashes & Embers
entry.summary:
Author: Mustbejegulusormostotherthings

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,634Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles Stilinski always knew there was something different about him—sparks danced at his fingertips when his emotions ran high, and strange things happened when he wasn’t paying attention. Years after the fall of the Nogitsune and the pack finally finding some peace, he begins to unravel the truth about his magical heritage: he’s not just a spark. He’s a conduit.With Beacon Hills growing restless under a rising supernatural threat, and Derek Hale—his wolf, his anchor, his boyfriend—by his side, Stiles is forced to confront the origin of his power. But the deeper he digs, the more dangerous it becomes. Because some embers were never meant to be reignited.And not everything that burns is meant to survive.
